text:
schaut hatte und [redacted_name] Passwort kannte. Sie wusste
auch nicht, dass[redacted_name] alle paar Tage nachsah, was [redacted_name]
für Nachrichten bekam. Schließlich war sie die große
Schwester, und da durfte man das. Oder so.
[redacted_name] vermied es, genauer darüber nachzudenken, was
[redacted_name] dazu sagen würde.
Seit drei Wochen stand [redacted_name] jeden Tag vor [redacted_name] auf und
loggte sich in ihren Account ein. Denn [redacted_name] hatte einen
Online-Freund! Er nannte sich [redacted_name]. Das gefiel Lisa
bestimmt, dachte [redacted_name]: der gleiche Vorname wie ihr
Lieblingssänger.
"Ich finde dich urschön", stand in[redacted_name] erster Nach-
rieht. "Wie alt bist du eigentlich?
"Steht doch da", hatte [redacted_name] ganz cool zurückgechattet.
Seither chatteten die beiden jeden Tag. Welche Schule,
welche Hobbys, welche Freunde ...
Seltsam, dachte [redacted_name], während sie [redacted_name] Account-Ein-
trans:
and knew [redacted_name]'s password. She didn't
know that [redacted_name] checked every few days to see what [redacted_name]
was getting. After all, she was the big
sister, and you were allowed to do that. Or so.
[redacted_name] avoided thinking about what
[redacted_name] would say about it.
For three weeks, [redacted_name] had been waking up before [redacted_name] every day and
logging into her account. Because [redacted_name] had an
online friend! He called himself [redacted_name]. Lisa was bound to like that,
[redacted_name] thought: the same first name as her
favorite singer.
“I think you're really beautiful,” read [redacted_name]'s first message.
“How old are you, anyway?
“It says here,“ [redacted_name] had replied, keeping her cool.
Since then, the two had been chatting every day. What school,
what hobbies, what friends...
“Weird,” [redacted_name] thought while she checked [redacted_name]'s account.
